评论概述: Could be a good shoe however.....
评论详情: Like many others, I was excited to try these shoes. However, the sizing is way off. I ordered two pairs to ensure I had the correct size, but both were extremely large—more than an inch too long.  The shoes are very comfortable with plenty of room in the toe, but they are narrow near the instep. One issue I encountered was that while the right shoe seemed fine, the left shoe was not sewn correctly in the front, which made the fit worse. The seams near the sides of the shoe are quite pronounced, and you can feel them immediately when you put the shoes on. I can only imagine how uncomfortable they would feel after wearing them for a few hours.  Additionally, I noticed that on the right shoe, the sole was separating from the shoe, and the glue appeared to be soft.

评论概述: Instant back relief!! Gave comfort to my flat feet with arthritic big toes.
类型: Size: 11 Wide Women/10 Wide MenColor: Black Gum
评论详情: Oh my goodness! My back has been aching for a few days. I admit the Birkenstocks I've been wearing are pretty worn out. As soon as I put these on, my back started relaxing. I can move around now! I'll come back to update after I wear them for work, but it was an immediate relief, and I have very flat feet and arthritis in the ball of my big toes. Any tight shoes aggravates the toes, but these have a wonderfully wide front without looking like clown shoes. I'll probably get the leather pair.

评论概述: It takes time to get used to barefoot shoes but so worth it!
类型: Size: 10 Wide Women/8.5 Wide MenColor: Grey
评论详情: This may be a really long review. I purchased these shoes in Sept 2023 after my PT told me they are better overall for building muscle and would help my back/joints. In Dec 2023 I suffered a back injury leaving me with extreme pain, weakness, and bad sciatica pain. I work retail and after work id come home in worse pain when I would wear these so I started rotating and only wearing them a few times a week. I built up to wearing them every single day and my left leg is no longer numb, my sciatica pain is non existent, I don’t have pain outside of normal working 10 hours on my feet pain, and now regular shoes feel weird. I am posting pictures of my absolutely destroyed pair as I am about to order another two pairs. They held up so well and honestly I’ll probably still keep them since the sole is still good they just need new inserts and a thorough washing.  Anyway, if you’re looking to help reduce pain in your legs, back, feet, I would recommend getting a pair and start adjusting to them. It took me about 3 months to really get to a point I could wear them daily and another 2 months and my pain is so much less it’s unreal. I’ll never go back! Plus they are so easy to clean.

类型: Size: 6 Wide Women/5 Wide MenColor: Wine Red

I was able to get overnight shipping so figured I'd give them a try.  These are not a women's 6.  It was a good 1 inch or more too long.

评论详情: These shoes are lightweight and comfortable.  They breathe which makes them nice in summertime. I have a few medical problems where my brain doesn’t really pay attention to where my body is which can make things like walking a challenging. My balance and coordination have improved and I don’t run into things or trip and fall near as often as I did. I’ve worn them daily for almost 6 months and they’re holding up really well. I noticed a big difference with my joints too. My feet, ankles, knees and hips just don’t hurt the way they usually do this time of year. Less pain is always a good thing if you ask me.

评论概述: Comfy shoe, quality control could be better
类型: Size: 10.5 Wide Women/9 Wide MenColor: Navy
评论详情: I bought 2 pairs, Navy and Red.  With the Navy pair, it felt like there was a rock over the ball of each foot.  It hurt, even wearing heavy socks.  The Red pair was just fine.  No painful bumps inside.  I managed to get ahold of those painful lumps and very carefully snip them out.  Now the Navy shoes are just as comfortable as the Red ones.  The lumps, shown in the photo, appear to be knots of thread.  Hopefully the whole shoe won't unravel now.  So far, so good.  As with all 'barefoot' style shoes I have tried, they tend to run short as compared to regular shoes and they bump the end of the toes unless I order the next size larger.  When comparing these women's size 10 wide to my size 9½ wide of regular shoes, the length is identical.

类型: Size: 8 Wide Women/7 Wide MenColor: All White
评论详情: Hello! Jessica from Texas here, I’m a real person leaving this review who took a chance and tried these shoes and I’m here to tell you about them. I always read reviews before I purchase or eat somewhere so here you go, I hope it helps. I have a wide toe box, high arch, the older I get the more problems I have. I have hippy feet that love to be free and naked. I usually wear Brooks Ghost (wide) running shoes and Clark sandals which aren’t perfect but they work. I started having an issue with one of my toes which prompted me to explore other options. I liked the style of these and hoped they would look good with anything from jeans, athletic, dress, shorts, etc. After wearing them I think they do look good with anything. I was worried the front would look too big like clown feet but it’s not bad at all. I wear no show socks with them, that’s my style preference. I do recommend wearing socks with them because there’s a spot on the inside that didn’t feel comfy when I tried them barefoot. Plus barefoot makes your shoes stink anyways. I was worried about my big toe busting out, as it has a history of this! But these have a protective layer on the inside and this is how the shoe exceeded my expectations, I didn’t notice it had it in the pictures online. The white is more of an off white than a bright white. They are very light weight, breathable, and flexible. When I put them on it takes a little adjustment with the tongue to get everything aligned so I wouldn’t say they are easy/quick slip on. After I put them on I went on a walk, immediately I noticed my calves, shin, and ankle area were tired because it must be a new way of walking my body needs to get used to. This went away eventually during the walk as I got used to walking flat footed. The walk went great so I have been wearing them for almost 2 weeks now everyday. I wore them on my trip to South Padre Island, I walked to the end of the long jetty and back, I walked on the beach with them, and walked all around the island. I wear them every day when I walk on the trail which has many different types of terrain. You feel the ground more with these but it doesn’t hurt me so far. I noticed they have a good grip on the ground. The bottoms don’t slip and slide. I can’t say for wet ground though until I experience it. I like them so much I’m ordering more colors. I’m not sure how I’m going to wash these white ones I got, but I think I should be gentle with them. Maybe after I wash them I’ll come back and update how that went.

类型: Size: 13.5 Wide Women/12 Wide MenColor: Wine Red
评论详情: Highly recommend. Thicker sole than a real barefoot shoe, but not a bad thing in this case. The shape of the shoe sole is wide and natural (even with my EEE wide feet it stays under the whole foot). The sole is also flat and does not have any arch support or try to lock your foot into a particular position. I've now purchased 4 pairs in multiple colors and they are all wearing pretty well, especially for the price.  If you are new to bare foot shoes, this might be a good starter because of the thicker sole with more cushion. After years of shoe salesman trying to sell me all kinds of arch support and clog-like shoes "supportive shoes", my back and foot pain disappeared when I switched to barefoot shoes.

评论详情: Son muy buenas zapatillas barefood, son comodas y transpirables, al inicio dude de comprarlos pero me arrepiento de no haberlo echo antes, llevo ya dos dias con estas y la verdad es lo mejor que compre, su plantilla esta bien acolchada si es que recien usas este tipo de calzado esta muy bien, si quieres una experiencia mas cercana al suelo quitasela, la tela permite que transpiren los pies por lo cual no sentiras tan caliente los pies como con zapatos tradicionales, no estoy seguro de su durabilidad pero viendo como esta echo creo que srguramente durara un buen tiempo si no lo usas para correr o alguna otra actividad intensiva. Algo mas, pensaba que tenia algun problema en la planta del pie debido a que luego de caminar o quedarme parado un rato con zapatos tradicionales sentia incomodidas y dolor, desde que empece a usarlo eso no a pasado, asi que si sientes lo mismo prueba usandolos :D

类型: Size: 10 Wide Women/8.5 Wide MenColor: Wine Red
评论详情: I have had my doubts in buying shoes from anywhere because my feet are diabetic and swell easily and are also very wide naturally with a high arch so shoes often hurt my feet.  I looked at all different types of bare feet shoes for months and struggled in purchasing anything. I finally decided on the shoe. I got them today and they are very comfortable. I enjoy that my feet do not feel crunched into a shoe. The sole is nice. Not super chunky, but still, I can feel that there is some ground underneath me which helps because I get off-balance very easily due to a lot of health issues.  So far after taking my shoes out for a spin, I still like them and would possibly buy another pair.  The only thing that I wish they had was a little bit wider around the arch area. I wish the whole shoe was as wide, kind of boxy as the tow area straight back if they had not curved it in for an arch, but that’s not a major thing for me, but it would be nice because my foot is also wide all the way back. It’s kind of like a big square, very hard to find shoes, but this is an excellent choice. The price was reasonable. I have probably three other pairs of shoes that I thought would work and have paid considerably higher amounts and within a week my feet were in so much pain so I am hoping that these shoes  Can help not being able to handle shoes on my feet. I do not go outside very much and have been almost what I would call trapped within my house. I am hoping they give me the freedom to want to get back out and walk and enjoy the world I think these shoes if I had to give them a grade one through 10 I would say they’re about a seven or a B.

I really like these shoes. They have a thin sole, so it's very close to being barefoot without being barefoot.

评论详情: These shoes have NO support. The workmanship was terrible. The "Shoes" would rub my feet raw from really bad stitching at the base of the tongue. When I put them on you could see my bare feet on both sides of the tongue. I don't think you should see the tops of your feet with these shoes on! I notified the seller and was told they don't "Support" these shoes but would do an exchange. I told them they could not sell items in the USA and not stand behind their product. After seeing the terrible workmanship I  really didn't want another pair. Well, PayPal took the sellers side which convinced me to NEVER buy thru PayPal again. I'll use a credit card and dispute the charges when foreign sellers sell junk and think you have no recourse. Thanks for nothing PayPal and Hobi Bear, you didn't screw me out of much but you got me! These crooked overseas sellers are ruining online shopping, at least for me, and PayPal tolerates it!!

类型: Size: 10 Wide Women/8.5 Wide MenColor: Navy
评论详情: I tried this shoe in two different sizes. My regular size women's 10W. It was not wide enough and too short. My toes rubbed against the top of the shoe. I ordered the next size up 11W. It was still too short--same length as the 10W. The 11W had slightly more width but the toe box on both sizes was not deep enough to be comfortable. The material of the shoe is nice and looked like it would hold up with regular wear. The sole was cushiony. If they had fit would have been a nice casual run around shoe.
